pages.text: $(li)Warped Fungus on a Stick can be used to control saddled Stridders.$(br)$(li)A Warped Fungus on a Stick can be crafted with a Fishing Rod and a Warped Fungus.
pages.title: Warped F. on a Stick

pages.text: $(li)To ride a Strider, first you have to equip a Saddle to the Strider.$(br)$(li)Then, right click to the Strider to ride it.$(br)$(li)Now, just hold the Warped Fungus on a Stick on your hand to make walk your Strider in any direction.$(br)$(li)Thanks to this, you will now be able to move through the lava in the Nether.
